participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and creative, with a passion for outdoor activities and a love for animals.
participant_1.background: I can be myself at work because my coworkers are all really accepting. I like horseback riding. I live with my pug and watch CSI to relax. I like to eat food from my parents' home country. Summer is my favorite season.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Curious and logical, enjoys technology and developing meaningful relationships.
participant_2.background: I remember visiting the petting zoo with my parents and brother when I was a kid. I remember playing with my siblings in the backyard and building forts. I love computers. I don't care about social media as much as I do about my relationships with my friends and family. I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.

content.text: Hello!
Hello! How are you doing today?
Great! I just got back from a horseback riding trip.
That sounds fun! I've never been horseback riding.
Oh, it's so much fun! You should try it sometime.
I will! I'm not sure where I can do it though.
There's a stable near my house. I can take you sometime if you want.
That would be great!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and build computers.
I love computers too! I build them for a living.
That's awesome! I build them as a hobby.
What's your favorite video game?
I like to play all sorts of games, but I'm really into the Sims right now.
I love the Sims too! I've been playing it since I was a kid.
Me too! I love creating my own characters and building my own houses.
Me too! It's so much fun to be creative.
It is! I'm glad I found someone who likes the Sims too.
Me too! We should play together sometime.
That would be fun
